page.title: 09Tourism west: FINTRY
page.content:
Apart from holiday cottages, one the main tourist facilities in this area{ is the{Caravan Club's}site at Ballikinrain.
This site, which is for club members only and provides minimal facilities, within a former enclosed garden, is sadly due for closure at the end of the current season.
The reasons are clearly financial and are the inevitability of the times in which we live. It does seem a pity that in a time of increasing leisure, a facility enjoyed by many dedicated caravaners is to be discontinued.
The Endrick, as elsewhere in Fintry, provides good fishing. This is either organised by local landowners or by the{Loch Lomond Angling Association.
